title: Paraplegic Drug Dealer Seeks Revenge | Crippled Justice | Crime Thriller Movie

sources.title: Paraplegic Drug Dealer Seeks Revenge | Crippled Justice | Crime Thriller Movie
sources.description:
Paraplegic Drug Dealer Seeks Revenge | Crippled Justice | Crime Thriller Movie

In the heart-pounding world of crime and vengeance, a drug dealer's life takes a dark turn when a deadly confrontation leaves him paralyzed. Consumed by rage and grief after the brutal murder of his father at the hands of a relentless vigilante detective, he is now left with nothing. Stripped of his family and trapped in a body that no longer moves, he must navigate a treacherous underworld and find a way to break the cycle of violence and death that has haunted him for too long. Will he seek ruthless retribution or discover a path to redemption? The explosive journey unfolds as he confronts his demons and the twisted fate that brought him to this point.

*Billy Club* | *Licensed from Green Apple. All rights reserved*
